# OpenAI's 3D DALL-E, AI in modern marketing, GPT4 10x better than ChatGPT

![Author](https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,onerror=redirect/uploads/user/profile_picture/fc858b4d-39e3-4be1-abf4-2b55504e21a2/thumb_uJ4UYake_400x400.jpg)

[Ben Tossell](https://www.twitter.com/bentossell)  
December 21, 2022

On the 21st day of Christmas my true love gave to me, an email talking about 3D DALL-E. Related; when do the 'days of Christmas' actually start?

Ho, Ho, Holy crap I've got to stop with the Christmas references.

Let's get to it.

### **ü§å Ben's Picks**

**Self-Instruct: Aligning language model with self generated instructions**. So what's the story here? OpenAI can get a large amount of user data and afford to pay many human annotators for their InstructGPT. What if you can't afford to do that? This team instruction-tuned the GPT3 model and tested how good it can be at following new instructions. The result? Self-instructed GPT3 (which barely uses any human annotation) outperformed those trained on other public datasets, performing close to InstructGPT-001. Exciting!! ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..taFyRxEt5dWJWZzykH5kTLmiRohC2C9hO-loLS6OLsc))

OpenAI prototype of **3D DALLE** (called ‚ÄúPoint-E‚Äù) is open sourced. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..4bgv0j_r6jUxi4yWrJrKJDaIf1dNiBqhvroeYd5TV8Y)) Of course, there's already a Hugging Face demo for the new text-to-3D model. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..m9itPr5MVRijC0xY6gbq0x11IocwK5zkKkQnP8ss-ys)) TechCrunch article [here](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..SYdTK7RA2kc5yUa9lojbmWeGm7vJAJtTVPJb6iJSR54). And you can read the arXiv research paper [here](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..rOcAEBxcM5PuovZ7CSn7NK3n6bifgH3m8HZtmDklGHI).

![](https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,onerror=redirect/uploads/asset/file/53822cc5-7eda-4d7e-90d3-857b8fef6428/paper_banner.gif)

Deleted tweet from Rippling co-founder: **Microsoft is all-in on GPT. GPT-4 10x better than 3.5(ChatGPT)**, clearing turing test and any standard tests. ([link](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..pfCHrzYv3Oh35cUOs1Qtp4sexuR-unVOxtGVqfaIhbU))

**This Detroit startup aims to shape the future of video creation with AI (Sponsor).**  
Small Michigan startup Waymark is trying to break down barriers to video creation with the help of AI. With Waymark, users just type in basic information, and a team of AI models generates a complete marketing video for them in minutes. It looks like this approach is already picking up steam - Waymark has a few enterprise clients under its belt and has been listed in both Hulu and Roku's creative directories.  
Check it out [here](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1cmwiOiJodHRwczovL3dheW1hcmsuY29tLyIsInBvc3RfaWQiOiJiNmIwZTVkMC04Y2Y5LTQwZWItOGFmMi0xMDhkNjczODBjYzkiLCJwdWJsaWNhdGlvbl9pZCI6IjQ0N2Y2ZTYwLWUzNmEtNDY0Mi1iNmY4LTQ2YmViMTkwNDVlYyIsInZpc2l0X3Rva2VuIjoiYTc1MDdiNzgtNzI2Ny00OTk0LWE5OTUtNzA3YzNjNzRhNDI4IiwiaWF0IjoxNjc0MDMxODUxLjQ5MSwiaXNzIjoib3JjaGlkIn0.zf1k1tBzL9wZizvsrvGYD5AlSgBNV7Vsi0KrncWgfk8).

* Ellie - **GPT-3 powered assistant that can reply to your emails**, has been officially launched and the first 50 users to use the coupon BENSBITES get 40% off. ([link](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1cmwiOiJodHRwczovL2VsbGllYWkuY29tLyIsInBvc3RfaWQiOiJiNmIwZTVkMC04Y2Y5LTQwZWItOGFmMi0xMDhkNjczODBjYzkiLCJwdWJsaWNhdGlvbl9pZCI6IjQ0N2Y2ZTYwLWUzNmEtNDY0Mi1iNmY4LTQ2YmViMTkwNDVlYyIsInZpc2l0X3Rva2VuIjoiYTc1MDdiNzgtNzI2Ny00OTk0LWE5OTUtNzA3YzNjNzRhNDI4IiwiaWF0IjoxNjc0MDMxODUxLjQ5MSwiaXNzIjoib3JjaGlkIn0.9lHfR9EFrSSvcJgBs817ri5szYb3uo8Kkl4dwehsDvo))

* Sentenceviz - A streamlit application to **visualise sentence embeddings**. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..7oS5HLDDezxG4WkHi2myWYhndKZVRl2xsWrWiCfO__Y))
* Kailua Labs Image Search API - An API to **easily search images, video, audio**, and more with AI. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1cmwiOiJodHRwczovL2FwcC5rYWlsdWFsYWJzLmNvbS9pbWFnZS1zZWFyY2g_.zJxjcSyfFoP_DuBKcLDk8s_oNOn-vVVnKnRMPZwzPhI))
* Softr Studio now has AI - **Generate images and copy within Softr** with just one click. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..8SwbTh39Rso_iH1hOrd5T055q-SrzI5WoL4b_z_O9-M))
* Gradio Discord Bot (BETA) - **Use any Hugging Face Space as a Bot** from within your Discord server. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..RIRfjAtDTZ_4jhd0BphJxfWgZHZwqSL88uegx-zqebY))

* Text Blaze - Chrome extension that **makes OpenAI GPT-3 available anywhere you type**. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1cmwiOiJodHRwczovL2JsYXplLnRvZGF5LyIsInBvc3RfaWQiOiJiNmIwZTVkMC04Y2Y5LTQwZWItOGFmMi0xMDhkNjczODBjYzkiLCJwdWJsaWNhdGlvbl9pZCI6IjQ0N2Y2ZTYwLWUzNmEtNDY0Mi1iNmY4LTQ2YmViMTkwNDVlYyIsInZpc2l0X3Rva2VuIjoiYTc1MDdiNzgtNzI2Ny00OTk0LWE5OTUtNzA3YzNjNzRhNDI4IiwiaWF0IjoxNjc0MDMxODUxLjQ5MSwiaXNzIjoib3JjaGlkIn0.HE4yiZfd2TK0HGPjmOD4YzEme8Bbccx7ZrnWDGLh4Q4))

### **üî¨ Research**

* **Improving video voice dubbing** through deep learning. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..QwQvP7ErXREtYIBy6eFo510c3LN59C5Df0Sm7xW054k))
* Instructor: An instruction-finetuned embedder that can **generate text embeddings tailored to any task given the task instruction**. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..PI4z6kD_fSFxC-BX9Z6rg6KiU_iXx8HIUa0frP3xtEA))
* Connect-the-Dots, a new **accounting algorithm that uses an indirect approach to accurately discretise privacy loss distributions**. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..O-ljrblrxgzpuiLArUsH2cMO1kJGKAISRpfAlqAV-Ow))
* ‚ÄòUnnatural Instructions‚Äô: A paper that proposes **a new method to automatically generate natural language instructions**. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..iFp_bxCHb4syswuTadY7p38jDqB6Yv579KRqmS2QI5g))
* **Rethinking the role of scale for in-context learning**: An interpretability-based case study at 66 billion scale. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..X0hfpErsuEOIf4wui0sXfeWUecBH5obwu12k40Y6yGQ))
* InstantAvatar: **Learning avatars from monocular video** in 60 seconds. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..45XoaVeNtzf58fk6JyjTz-43hJxSRkPpS8eBadWNXTY))
* **Why can GPT learn in-context?** Language models secretly perform gradient descent as meta optimisers. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..hdvf4Dj8XvnV8dcYhuhBo9IfT88ecyjB5jdTI4tzguE))
* **Pretraining without attention**. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..rI6QiUdunuJBWniFCsWgIEqO1CQPXqLd5bCMF7WdqFI))
* Length extrapolation: **Training on short texts** while evaluating longer sequences. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..2z0Nww5muzEluTXr2OJ88sa2Tse3EAR6wxzsaoPCYSw))
* SODA: **Million-scale dialogue distillation** with social commonsense contextualisation. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5KsG4ExvOzzrgmyTj7WxbnnJdkORbjzTvU-SQqo9uWU))
* Panoptic Lifting, a novel approach for **learning panoptic 3D volumetric representations from images**of in-the-wild scene. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..lhEQKlJEBq0Oc3iCfQw6vZWrQDet2sDB3pJZWvaSxKw))
* MetaCLUE, a set of **vision tasks on visual metaphor**, and a collection of high-quality and rich metaphor annotations. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..DEPz7GBIlxKZDRZLNC9Q1VW22SuUBK8oyG-C14M3xhk))
* LayoutDETR: **Detection transformer** is a good multimodal layout designer. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..rHwhGSE3vEeb_qbj552qefaUTFzot4o8RHNQkmFrEMA))
* **Character-aware models improve visual text rendering**. ([<u>link</u>](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..IFIqcgHn6s2jAhU6jpqCRoQAqxaYGT9NuubXrSpTXQ8))
